name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 花咲みのり
summary:
気が弱く、心配性でクラスでも
あまり目立たない女の子。
--
She is a girl of shy, timid character and without conspicious in her class. For she doesn't want to become a trouble, she goes to clinic by only herself......

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!
info:
• 平台: Android
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: JP¥210
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=air.TDPMinoriHanasakiB
  • 英文名: Tap de PuruMoe!! Minori Hanasa
